mcq.statement: What does the idiom 'in the same boat' imply when referring to a group of people?

options.a: They are going on a vacation together
options.b: They are facing the same challenges or circumstances
options.c: They are working in the same industry
options.d: They are related to each other

mcq.one_liner: The idiom 'in the same boat' means that a group of people are in the same situation, usually facing the same challenges or difficulties.
